tweak.tweakDescription:
Exemplifies Apple's modern design language, bringing a touch of skeuomorphism back into the mix! 
 
This is Gamma's temporary home and there will be updates later on my Twitter page. Please DM me with any questions or concerns. 
 
NOTE: Please install a theme manager like Anemone or SnowBoard before installing this!
tweak.tweakChangelog: • Added a bunch of new first-party icons • Adjusted some previously added icons • Added an optional new red Music icon
